description:
amato gets assaulted by Miyako, as usual, but this time Yamato also runs into someone unexpected in the bath. Yamato engages in fast talking to try to escape safely. Later, he has a heart-to-heart with Doggy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Maji de Watashi to Katari Nasai!!
真剣で私と語りなさい!!
